channel.title: PvP Max hit?
channel.description:
Hey guys.
First: Im not a noob in coding lmao.
Okay here's my problem
I know how 2 change the max hit of a weapon like Bgs.
I changed 2 - 70 random 8 So It's 78 Max !
But in wildy i only hit 40.
How can i change that ?
Thanks , gh0st.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2008, 10:44:52 am[/size][hr]Sad , if some one needs help I'll help within 5 Minutes.
And i don't get help now ._. ...

item.title: PvP Max hit?
item.dc:creator: @scottbenton scottbenton
item.description:
@scottbenton wrote:

there should be a pvp or pk bit on it it should say somet like this

hitDiff = 30 + misc.random(20); //change this inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 1); // change this actionTimer = 50; //delete this? setAnimation(369); //delete this? teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; stillgfx(368, absY, absX);
I am not that experienced at java i just think this would be it.
